name: ShinyDrugTrip
description:
It's a twinstick arena shooter where mice and pigs are trying to destroy your spaceship, because they're evil and stuff. Some enemies might even reflect the bullets you shoot at them back at you.

I made this game for the MirrorGameJam hosted by Matthew Paleje. Huge thanks to him for motivating me to finally finish a game. In fact this is the very first game I finished. And thanks to everyone who took the time to look at it :)
